alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Kaufman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 22 at 8:33PM CDT until August 24 at 8:26PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River Near Rosser affecting Ellis and Kaufman Counties. For the Trinity River...including Dallas, Rosser, Trinidad, Long Lake (Oakwood)...Moderate flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River Near Rosser. * WHEN...Until Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 34.0 feet, Minor to moderate flooding of low areas and roads within the levees is expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Monday the stage was 28.1 feet. - Flood stage is 31.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 33.8 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday morning. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
